MLModel.name: MLModel
MLModel.description: Represents an AI model that can be used in Einstein Prediction Builder, Einstein Recommendation Builder, and other Einstein features.

ApprovalStatus.description: Indicates whether the model is approved, pending approval, or rejected.

Dataset.description: The ID of the dataset used to create the model.

Name.description: The automatically generated ID that uniquely identifies the model.

PredictionDefinitionId.description: The ID of the related prediction definition.

RecommendationDefinitionId.description: The ID of the related recommendation definition.

ScoringStatus.description: Indicates whether scoring is enabled or disabled.

TrainingEndTime.description: Indicates the date and time when the training ended.

TrainingStartTime.description: Indicates the date and time when the training started.
